title: Sajek Valley: Kingdom of Clouds
description: Queen of Hills & Roof of Rangamati (Specialized Group Tour)

title: Largest Sea Beach in The World
description: Cox's Bazar - The Never Ending Sea Beach
detail: Day - 01: Arrival at Cox'sbazar.  Upon arrival at Cox's Bazar check in at the hotel. Hotel Representative will pick you from the airport to the hotel. Most of the time, the room is available to check-in) Overnight night stay in Cox’s Bazar .  Day - 02: Free Day   Explore the city by your own. Day- 03: Departure

title: Simply Maldives
included: Air Tickets,Hotel, Breakfast, Tours, Airport transfers
detail: Day 1: Arrival at Hulhumale. After arrival at the airport. Transfer to the Hotel on your own. Check-in at the hotel. Enjoy free time on your own. Overnight stay at the hotel.  Day 2: Free Day After having breakfast at the hotel, the rest of the day is for your own purpose. Day 3: Departure From Hulhumale. Breakfast at the hotel. Transfer to Velana International Airport on your own. Catch the return flight to Dhaka Bangladesh.

title: Golden Traingle
description: New Delhi, India - Jaipur, India - Agra, India
detail: Day 01: Delhi Airport –Hotel Day, Day 02: Delhi Hotel + Full day Sightseeing Day 03: Delhi –Agra Sightseeing (216 Km / 3 ½ hrs) On the way Visit Mathura Day 04: Agra –Jaipur via Fatehpur Sikri (245 Km / 4 hrs) Day 05: Jaipur Local Sightseeing Day 06: Hotel –Jaipur Railway Station / Airport

title: Heaven on Earth
